com.cmput301fa16t5.legendary_telegram

Class CentralController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301fa16t5.legendary_telegram.CentralController

  • public class CentralController
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by keith on 11/2/2016. THIS CLASS IS A SINGLETON Only one exists in the system at any given time. Does most of the work with GsonController and ESearchController. Talks to the User class which controllers the Rider and Driver behaviour. Essentially acts as a crossroad between the live data (User and it's Rider/Driver), the outside world/database and the user Via the activities and their controllers.

      • canBeDriver

        public boolean canBeDriver(android.content.Context context)
        Checks if the current user can be a Driver (has filled out vehicle field) and if so, sets them as it.
        Parameters:
        context - Needed for GSON
        Returns:
        True if they can be a Driver. False otherwise.

      • checkUserName

        public boolean checkUserName(java.lang.String username,
                             android.content.Context context)
        Uses the GSON controller to check if a given username is valid. I.E. Does that user exist on disk already.
        Parameters:
        username - Name of user to be checked.
        context - Needed for Gson.
        Returns:
        True if user exists. False otherwise.

      • selectCurrentRequest

        public boolean selectCurrentRequest(int index)
        Called by MainRequest Activity/Controller when a User clicks on a Request Sets that to be the current Request for Rider/Driver.
        Parameters:
        index - Index of the request.
        Returns:
        True if Driver, false if Rider.
